description: Pre-transformation John. HS → early college. Family tension, 723-day relationship, early ECD involvement. Building the foundation.
Reconciliation begins. 'My oh my, how the times have changed.' Crazy Chili Dog post signals inner restlessness.
The year everything changed. Coming out ('the power of an internal desire liberated!'). ECD peak. New identity forged. Yeah I Said It: 'I've never felt happier to be alive.'
Post-threshold navigation. ECD retirement (171 events, legacy secured). College graduation. Career launch at Sunrise. Torn labrum surgery. New friendships forming.
Deepening identity. The Influlist (crediting origins). Merrie Melodies (mapping friendships to music). Career advancing. WrestleMania streaks continuing.
The most documented year. Undertaker handshake (20-year dream fulfilled through 5 friends). Peak joy. But also peak vulnerability — everything desired has been achieved. Now what?
Quieter years. 2015 under-documented. 2017: spinal surgery — the body rebels. Physical ordeal forces reassessment.
Post-surgery comeback. Mediterranean cruise. 1,000th CHA game. COVID forces universal pause. Inner strength tested differently.
The mature chapter. Engagement. Executive Director promotion. 20th WrestleMania. Relationship transition in 2025. The elixir is wisdom: 'When you enjoy the journeys, the destinations magnify.'
